definition: (used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Russia stretches across much of the north of the supercontinent of Eurasia.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯橫跨歐亞大陸北部的大部分地區。

sentences.english: Eurasian marten having a brown coat with pale breast and throat.
sentences.chinese: 歐亞大陸的貂，褐色皮毛，雄部和。

sentences.english: This species is very widely distributed in tropical and warm regions of the Old World.
sentences.chinese: 本種是在歐亞大陸的熱帶和溫暖的地區裏的廣泛分佈。

sentences.english: Three powers are emerging on the periphery of Eurasia.
sentences.chinese: 在歐亞大陸周緣地帶將出現三大勢力。

sentences.english: The land mass comprising the continents of Europe and Asia.
sentences.chinese: 常見於歐亞大陸北部的陸棲小毒蛇。

sentences.english: The more central Ural Mountains is a north-south range which divides Europe from Asia.
sentences.chinese: 更中心的烏拉爾山脈是區分歐亞大陸的西北面的山脈。

sentences.english: Eurasiatic sandgrouse with a black patch on the belly.
sentences.chinese: 腹部有黑色斑點的歐亞大陸的沙雞。

sentences.english: Ground in the Dalian City Eurasia is big six east coastses, Chinese northeast, Liaotung Peninsula is the most south to carry.
sentences.chinese: 大連市地處歐亞大陸東岸，中國東北遼東半島最南端。

sentences.english: Armenia is a land-locked country located in Eurasia's Southern Caucasus mountain range.
sentences.chinese: 亞美尼亞是位於歐亞大陸南高加索山脈的內陸國。

sentences.english: Eurasia comprises the whole of the northern part of the European and Asiatic land-mass, from Portugal to the Bering Strait .
sentences.chinese: 歐亞國佔歐亞大陸的整個北部，從葡萄牙到白令海峽。

sentences.english: All the historical pretenders to global power originated in Eurasia.
sentences.chinese: 歷史上所有力圖奪取全球霸權的勢力發源於歐亞大陸。

sentences.english: Eurasia is the world's axial super-continent.
sentences.chinese: 歐亞大陸是世界的軸向超大陸。

sentences.english: A country spread-eagles Asia and Europe —that is Turkey .
sentences.chinese: 一個橫跨歐亞大陸的國家，這就是土耳其。

sentences.english: A country spread-eagles Asia and Europe —that is Turkey.
sentences.chinese: 一個橫跨歐亞大陸的國家，這就是土耳其。

sentences.english: Hunting with eagles is a centuries-old tradition in Eurasia.
sentences.chinese: 用鷹來捕獵，是歐亞大陸上許多世紀以來的古老傳統。

definition: lit. as close as lips and teeth (idiom); closely related/interdependent
